DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the effects of early intervention on language skills for children with hearing loss.
DOC.brief_title: Maximizing Language Development in Children With Hearing Loss
DOC.criteria: 6 to 18 months of age bilateral, moderate to profound congenital hearing loss auditory neuropathy no known additional disabilities (e.g., cerebral palsy, Down syndrome) both parents have a severe to profound hearing loss
